personalInfo.name: Mina Youaness!
personalInfo.summary: A highly innovative and passionate Full-Stack front-end web development technologist, with over 10 years of experience in developing and designing creative and interactive user-centric websites and portals. Looking to build scalable, performing applications and creating meaningful user experiences through beautiful and inspired web applications. Possess a strong security mindset, integrating secure coding practices and proactive measures to mitigate risks in web application development

summary: A highly innovative and passionate Full-Stack front-end web development technologist, with over 10 years of experience in developing and designing creative and interactive user-centric websites and portals. Looking to build scalable, performing applications and creating meaningful user experiences through beautiful and inspired web applications. Possess a strong security mindset, integrating secure coding practices and proactive measures to mitigate risks in web application development

experience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
experience.description: Worked on Turris ERP project and other Harplabs client projects.
achievements: Led frontend projects using Angular, React, Material components, and PWA for seamless user experiences.
Utilized Angular with DevExtreme for building robust and responsive interfaces, and developed backend APIs with NodeJs to manage DevExtreme needs.
Used TypeScript, JavaScript, SASS, and LESS for scalable, maintainable code and advanced CSS management.
Integrated jQuery for DOM manipulation in legacy projects, enhancing dynamic content updates.
Collaborated across teams to gather requirements and design user-friendly interfaces.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs with Spring Boot and Node.js, ensuring seamless front-end-backend integration.
Managed PostgreSQL, MySQL & T-SQL databases for data integrity and performance.
Implemented WebSockets for real-time communication, enhancing application dynamics.
Led WordPress projects with Bootstrap/Tailwind CSS for custom themes/plugins, ensuring seamless communication with other servers through APIs.
Participated in code reviews, optimizing quality and maintainability.
Stayed updated on industry trends, expanding skills for innovative solutions.
Ensured secure development practices, including data validation and protection of sensitive user information, throughout the lifecycle of PWA and API development.

experience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer (Contract for Turris Group)
experience.description: Turris ERP System, a web app ERP that manages day-to-day business activities for Turris Corp.
achievements: Developed comprehensive ERP system managing day-to-day business activities for Turris Corp.
Implemented robust security measures with role-based access control and encryption protocols.
Built industrial web applications with focus on scalability and performance.
Collaborated with stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
Ensured data integrity and security throughout the ERP system lifecycle.

experience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
experience.description: EntityConnect is an Entity management & communications app with special focus on the end user. The app handles church membership, groups, check-in, volunteers, event registration, contributions, online/mobile donations, Services management, reporting, assimilation, workflow and many more features.
achievements: Led development of EntityConnect, a comprehensive entity management and communications platform.
Implemented church membership management, group organization, and volunteer coordination systems.
Developed event registration and contribution tracking features with online/mobile donation capabilities.
Designed and implemented database schemas for complex church management workflows.
Led team using Agile/Scrum methodologies for efficient project delivery.
Built reporting and assimilation features to enhance church community engagement.
Utilized Angular with Kendo UI for rich, interactive user interfaces.
Implemented SailsJS and Node.js backend for scalable server-side operations.

experience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
experience.description: Abgadya (alphabetic) online learning platform PWA for high school students. Provides educational content through books, videos, lessons, and exercises for students
achievements: Developed Abgadya, an innovative online learning platform PWA for high school students.
Created comprehensive educational content delivery system with books, videos, lessons, and exercises.
Implemented Progressive Web App (PWA) features for offline learning capabilities.
Built responsive cross-platform application using Angular 10 and Ionic framework.
Developed robust backend using PHP and Laravel for content management and user progress tracking.
Integrated WordPress for content management and administrative features.
Designed user-friendly interface optimized for student learning experience.
Implemented interactive exercises and progress tracking for enhanced student engagement.

experience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer (Freelance)
experience.description: Specializing in marketing solutions for healthcare industries; Medical Rep App helps pharmaceutical companies manage their sales teams and medical reps
achievements: Specialized in developing marketing solutions for healthcare industries.
Created Medical Rep App for pharmaceutical companies to manage sales teams and medical representatives.
Built cross-platform mobile applications using Ionic and Angular 7-10.
Implemented responsive web interfaces using Bootstrap and NGX Bootstrap.
Developed PHP backend solutions for healthcare data management.
Designed user-friendly interfaces for complex healthcare workflows.
Ensured compliance with healthcare industry standards and regulations.
Delivered scalable solutions for pharmaceutical sales team management.

projects.name: Portfolio Site (minaragaie.github.io)
projects.description: Developer portfolio and resume site with VS Code-inspired UI, GitHub-backed content (no database), unified backend API via GitHub Storage, static-exported Next.js frontend on GitHub Pages, and serverless admin powered by GitHub API.

additionalInfo: All my projects are hosted on private repositories due to confidentiality reasons. They are available for review upon request. Security expertise demonstrated through multiple certifications, including Google Cybersecurity Certificate
